title: Zicam Cold Remedy Ultra Homeopathic Crystals Lemon-Lime - 18 CT
description: Other Information: Store at room temperature 59-84 degrees F (15-29 degrees C). Misc: Homeopathic. Get rid of your cold faster. Reduces the duration of a cold. Concentrated formula. Great for on-the-go. Convenient dosing. No water needed. Take at the fist sign of a cold. The pre-cold medicine. Melts in your mouth. Get rid of your cold faster with Zicam Ultra Cold Remedy! This product is not required to go through the FDA's New Drug Application approval process. Take Zicam Cold Remedy at the first sign of a cold. Great tasting lemon lime flavor. Quickly dissolves in the mouth without water. Convenient individually dosed packets. Non-drowsy. Non-habit forming. Satisfaction guaranteed. Visit us on the web at www.zicam.com.
